function NPC_110033:Retreat( ThisNPC, Enemy ) local Dir = ThisNPC:GetFowardDir(Enemy)
local Points1 = Math_GetPolygonPoints( Enemy:GetPos(), Dir, 250, 8 ) local Point1Idx = ( 6 + math.random( 0, 2 ) )%8 +1
local distance = ThisNPC:DistanceTo( Enemy ) if distance < 300 then ThisNPC:Move( Points1[ tostring( Point1Idx ) ] ) end
local Points2 = Math_GetPolygonPoints( Enemy:GetPos(), Dir, 600, 16 ) local Point2Idx = (Point1Idx*2 + math.random( -1, 1 ) -1 )%16 +1 ThisNPC:Move( Points2[ tostring( Point2Idx ) ] ) ThisNPC:FaceTo( Enemy ) end
function NPC_110033:Rotate( ThisNPC, Enemy ) local Distance = ThisNPC:DistanceTo(Enemy) -- 목표와의 거리 local EdgeCnt = 8
local Points = Math_GetPolygonPoints(Enemy:GetPos(), ThisNPC:GetFowardDir(Enemy) , Distance, EdgeCnt ) local WayPoints = {}
if math.random(0,1) == 1 then for i=1, 2 do WayPoints[i] = Points[tostring(i)] end else for i=6, 7 do WayPoints[ i-5 ] = Points[ tostring( 13-i ) ] end end
ThisNPC:PatrolInstant(WayPoints, PT_ONCE) ThisNPC:FaceTo( Enemy ) ThisNPC:Wait(0.5) end
